price: (69) Do you not consider those who dispute concerning the signs of Allāh - how are they averted?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أَنَّىٰ يُصۡرَفُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna yujādilūna fī āyāti al-lahi annā yuṣ'rafūna
